text: "'Funny stuff on the news,' Mr Dursley mumbled. "'Owls shooting stars. "'There were a lot of funny-looking people in town today.' "'So?' snapped Mrs Dursley. "'Well, I just thought maybe it was something to do with, you know, her lot.'

segments.text: "'Funny stuff on the news,' Mr Dursley mumbled.
"'There were a lot of funny-looking people in town today.'
"'Well, I just thought maybe it was something to do with, you know, her lot.'
